title: International
content:
International Criminal Court judges have removed chief prosecutor Karim Khan from the war crimes case against former Philippines President Rodrigo Duterte. This decision stems from a potential conflict of interest. Khan previously represented the Philippines Human Rights Commission. The court cited his prior role as a reason for potential bias.

KEC International has landed a significant Rs 1,064 crore contract in Saudi Arabia for a 380 kV transmission line. This latest win, part of a strong Middle East performance, boosts the company's international transmission and distribution order book.  With year-to-date orders exceeding Rs 15,000 crore, KEC International continues its global infrastructure expansion.
